form.num_y_letras: Field must contain at least one letter
form.num_o_letras: Field must not contain blank spaces
form.solo_num_and_decimals: Field only accepts numbers and decimals
form.notSameAsDirector: Alternate Director cannot be the same as Director
form.rutMustBeDifferent: RUT must be different from the RUT already registered
form.notSameDirectorsInUpdate: The RUT entered is already associated with the Director or Alternate Director.
form.invalidRangeMax: The minimum grade cannot be higher than the maximum grade
form.invalidRangeMin: The maximum grade cannot be lower than the minimum grade
